title: Ranking & Recognition - KIIT Deemed to be University
summary: Key rankings, recognitions and awards received by KIIT Deemed to be University across national and international bodies.

title: Times Higher Education World University Rankings 2026
text: KIIT Deemed to be University retained its position in the Times Higher Education World University Ranking 2026 within the 501-600 cohort, reflecting quality teaching, research and global reputation.

title: THE Asia University Ranking 2025
text: KIIT was ranked 184th in THE Asia University Rankings 2025 and stood as the 8th best university in India among both government and private institutions; top-ranked deemed university in Eastern and Northern India.

title: QS World University Rankings: Asia 2026
text: KIIT Deemed to be University was placed at rank 294 in QS World University Rankings: Asia 2026, demonstrating growth in teaching, research, and international partnerships.

title: NIRF India Rankings 2025 (Universities)
text: Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology was ranked 17th among Indian Universities by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF), Ministry of Education, Government of India.

title: ARIIA Ranking 2021
text: Ranked No.1 among Private Higher Education Indian Universities by Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) 2021.

title: Times Higher Education Impact Rankings 2025
text: KIIT ranked in the 101-200 cohort in THE Impact Rankings 2025 with standout positions across several SDGs.

title: Times Higher Education Young University Rankings 2024
text: KIIT ranked 168th in THE Young University Rankings 2024, reflecting strong academic foundation and performance among young institutions.

title: Odisha State Energy Conservation Award (OSECA) 2023
text: KIIT received the Odisha State Energy Conservation Award (OSECA) 2023 in the Educational Institute category on 14th December 2023.

title: Times Higher Education Emerging Economies University Rankings 2022
text: KIIT was ranked 201-250 in THE Emerging Economies University Rankings 2022, an improvement from 251-300 in 2021.

title: Rashtriya Khel Protsahan Puruskar 2022
text: KIIT conferred Rashtriya Khel Protsahan Puruskar 2022 for promotion of sports; award given by President of India to the Founder.

title: QS World University Rankings 2026 (mentions)
text: KIIT secured a position in QS World University Rankings 2026; noted as No.1 among private institutions in Odisha, 9th among India's top private universities and 55th in 2025 QS Asian University Rankings for Southern Asia.

title: QS 5 Stars Rating 2021
text: KIIT became India's first QS 5 Stars Rated University in 2021, awarded across all categories of QS criteria.

title: QS BRICS University Rankings 2018
text: KIIT was the first private university in Odisha to enter QS BRICS Rankings in 2018 (251-300 cohort).

title: THE Awards Asia 2021
text: KIIT received 'Leadership And Management Team Of The Year' at THE Awards Asia 2021 for pandemic response and relief work.

title: AICTE Utkrisht Sansthan Vishwakarma Award 2020
text: Awarded by AICTE for outstanding contributions in post-COVID-19 schemes and measures.

title: Institution of Eminence (IoE) Tag - LoI 2019
text: KIIT received Letter of Intent for Institution of Eminence (IoE) tag from Ministry of HRD (UGC) with distinction as the youngest university to get this tag.

title: ISAS Badge from IAU 2019
text: KIIT became the first Indian university to get Internationalization Strategies Advisory Service (ISAS) Badge at IAU conference in Puebla, Mexico on Nov 13-15, 2019.

title: Historical / notable rankings & mentions
items: Ranked 8th by World QS Rankings - 2018 among private institutions in India.
Odisha's first private university to enter QS BRICS Rankings (2018).
